message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I believe this split reflects the fact that we both lose money over time, but you lose it faster.
Alice, your offer was tempting, but let's be realistic. I lose money faster with each round. This offer is more in line with the depreciation.
Bob, we're both losing money here. This is a compromise that takes the depreciation into account, but let's not waste any more rounds.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  We're both losing money fast.  A 50/50 split is the only fair option at this point.
